statements.query: MATCH (cgr:CodeguruRecommendation)-[:HAS_RECOMMENDATION_FEEDBACK]->(crf:CodeguruRecommendationFeedback) WHERE crf.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH crf DETACH DELETE (crf)
MATCH (cgc:CodeguruCodereview)-[:HAS_RECOMMENDATION]->(cgr:CodeguruRecommendation) WHERE cgr.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH cgr DETACH DELETE (cgr)
MATCH (cga:CodeguruAssociation)-[:HAS_CODEREVIEW]->(cgc:CodeguruCodereview) WHERE cgc.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH cgc DETACH DELETE (cgc)
